- Title: The Hangover  (2010) )  | Plot: Three friends, Phil, Stu and Doug go to Las Vegas for a bachelor party. When they arrive in Las Vegas, they are given a limo ride from the airport to their hotel suite. During the drive, all three of them begin to feel ill and dizzy. At first, they attribute this feeling to dehydration caused by the long flight from New York City. However, as the day progresses, all three of them continue to experience a growing sense of unease and confusion. Finally, when the night comes and all three of them are sitting in their hotel suite drinking alcohol and engaging in other forms of reckless behavior, they suddenly realize that they have forgotten about their bachelor party. In shock and panic, all three of them immediately begin to feel extremely sick and dizzy.
